channel.title: Need a client... suggestions please?
channel.description:
i have the source of allstar scape 2.2 and ive edited it alot and alot but i need a client for it which holds all items on it and specs etc etc can any1 suggest please?
i need a downloadble client because some of my players cant get the silab client loading...
thx guys

item.title: Need a client... suggestions please?

item.description:
@sardomin673 wrote:

Try using the silab webclient
